channel.title: Phantom / There is Nobody Left - Wolf Light [Electronic]
channel.description:
Hi everyone.
First post after lurking for almost a year! I've been using Auxy to create music for a few months now and have released six songs on streaming services so far. I obviously have a lot to learn, but I just wanted to share one of the tracks I'm proudest of.
https://soundcloud.com/wolflightmusic/phantom
I do all my drum programming in Auxy, never any other DAW, however this track does have some samples that I created in Logic Pro and then imported back into Auxy.
If anyone is a Spotify user, I can be found here, along with everything I've released so far: https://open.spotify.com/artist/2rlQFmZY5XYKh556dQf8Tv?si=xiU4nUIuRd-lMrJHwjoE1g
Thanks for taking the time to read and hopefully listen!
